{{anglosaxon infobox | name=Heden | image= | caption= | people=[[wikipedia:Angles (tribe)|Angle]] | pronun= | othernames= | titles= | position= | location=''Possibly'' [[wikipedia:Anglia (peninsula)|Anglia]] | affiliation= | language=[[Old English]] | birth= | birthlocation= | rule= | death= | deathlocation= | age= | notablefor= | house= | parentage=Said to be a descendant of [[wikipedia:Odin|Wóden]] | siblings= | spouse= | children=[[Eoh]] & [[Beorn (son of Heden)|Beorn]] | gender=Male | height= | hair= | eyes= | clothing= | weapons= | steed= }} '''Heden''', "the leather and fur clad", was the father of [[Eoh]] and [[Beorn (son of Heden)|Beorn]], and a grandfather of [[Eriol]], according to the early version of the [[legendarium]] in ''[[The Book of Lost Tales]]''.
